title: Why did Nehru address Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose as a war criminal? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jawaharlal Nehru was one of the lawyers defending the captured soldiers of Bose’s INA after the war. Please look up Red fort trials. Due to the public and political pressure from protests led by INC and mutiny by Indians soldiers on British Indian army and Navy, the British were not able to take any actions against the captured INA soldiers. Please educate yourselves before you besmirch the name of one of the foremost leaders of Indian Independence movement. Please watch this interview. She was related to Bose and CR Das. She is the daughter of one of the founders of INA. She herself was an officer in the Rani Jhansi regiment of the INA. Towards the end of the interview she talks about the role Nehru played after the end of the war.
